contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 30, 2017 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Best march - Kingdom Brass Best hymn - Kingdom Brass Winning conductor - David Roberts (Bon Accord Silver) Best Fife 'A' Band - Kingdom Brass Best Fife 'B' Band - Dunfermline Town Best 1st section - Bathgate Best 2nd section - Campbeltown Brass Best 3rd section - Irvine & Dreghorn Best 4th section - Kilmarnock Concert Best cornet - Kingdom Brass Best horn - Flugel, Johnstone Best euphonium/baritone - Euphonium, Bon Accord Silver Best trombone - Bon Accord Silver Best basses - Kingdom Brass Best percussion - Bon Accord Silver
Bon Accord Silver receive an invite to the 2018 Senior Trophy
Sept. 11, 2017, 1:15 p.m. Oct. 9, 2017, 10:47 a.m.
1 Bon-Accord Silver Band David Roberts A Tale as yet Untold
2 Kingdom Brass Paul Drury Of Men and Mountains
